Constructor Detail

DesktopGameGraphics

public DesktopGameGraphics()
Game graphics' default constructor. Creates an instance providing 32x32 sprites.

See Also:
DesktopGameGraphics(org.ezze.games.storekeeper.DesktopGameGraphics.SpriteDimension)

DesktopGameGraphics

public DesktopGameGraphics(DesktopGameGraphics.SpriteDimension spriteDimension)
Game graphics' constructor. One have to provide desired sprite dimension as spriteDimension. Generally you will want to use 32x32 sprites so pass DesktopGameGraphics.SpriteDimension.DIMENSION_32X32. This automatically is done by default constructor DesktopGameGraphics(). But in some cases you may need to create an instance providing 16x16 sprites and then pass DesktopGameGraphics.SpriteDimension.DIMENSION_16X16 (e.g. for small screen resolution).

Parameters:
spriteDimension - Desired sprite dimension DesktopGameGraphics.SpriteDimension

getAnimationStepShift

public double getAnimationStepShift()
Description copied from interface: GameGraphics
Retrieves worker's shift as part of level item per one game's loop iteration. It's strongly advised return value * N = 1.0, where N is action animation steps' count.

Specified by:
getAnimationStepShift in interface GameGraphics
Returns:
Animation step's shift
